package.name: tor-browser-de
package.install:
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin # tar -cf - tor-browser_de | tar -C ${TGTDIR}/opt -xf - # unxz -c install -m 0644 tor-browser_de.tar ${TGTDIR}/opt/ mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/.config touch ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/.config/empty_by_intention
######### Create starter for TOR browser
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/tor-browser cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/tor-browser << FFRUN #!/bin/sh
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:\$PATH export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
cd /opt/tor-browser_de
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec ./start-tor-browser sudo /opt/tor-browser_de/tor-browser_smack
FFRUN
######### Set some permissions
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/tor-browser
######### Create starter for TOR browser using smack
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/tor-browser_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/tor-browser_smack << FFSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
export PATH=$PATH:/opt/bin:/opt/sbin cd /opt/tor-browser_de /static/sbin/newsmack netmgr /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/tor-browser_de/start-tor-browser"
FFSMACK
########## Set some permissions
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/tor-browser_smack chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/start-tor-browser chown -R 1000:1000 ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de
